data.description: Join Nokia Bell Labs' AI Accelerator Group and collaborate with a multidisciplinary team developing advanced AI solutions for networks and automation. In this role, you'll research and implement innovative AI and machine learning approaches to solve real-world challenges, design software frameworks and tools to support the full AI lifecycle. You will also contribute to data management, model development, and testing. Guided by experienced mentors, you'll strengthen both your technical and professional skills while contributing to impactful innovations that shape the future of intelligent networks.
